C

checkForLimit(int) - Method in class core.Connect4
checkForLimit is a method just looks at a single in the top row of the board, and is utilized in order to detect a full column and to have the user pick a different spot to play in if true
checkForlimitTest_false() - Method in class test.Connect4Test
 
checkForlimitTest_true() - Method in class test.Connect4Test
 
checkForlimitTest_wronginput() - Method in class test.Connect4Test
 
checkForSpace() - Method in class core.Connect4
checkForSpace is a method which checks every position on the board, and if it cannot find an a single empty space, it will return true and tell the UI to end and inform the players of a tie game
checkForSpace() - Method in class core.Connect4ComputerPlayer
checkForSpace is used to generate a random place for Monty to place his piece in the situation that the column he wants to select is full
checkforSpace_test() - Method in class test.Connect4ComputerPlayerTest
 
checkForSpaceTest_empty() - Method in class test.Connect4Test
 
checkForSpaceTest_full() - Method in class test.Connect4Test
 
checkForSpaceTest_halfFull() - Method in class test.Connect4Test
 
checkInt() - Method in class core.Connect4
checkInt makes sure the user input is an int and does not break the program
checkRange(List<Point2D>) - Method in class ui.Connect4GUI
checkRange checks if their are 4 pieces in a row and is a helper method to gameOver
Connect4 - Class in core
connect4Core is the core of a Java connect4 game, which hold all the methods which the UI will use to simulate the game
Connect4() - Constructor for class core.Connect4
connect4Core constructs a 2d array, which will be used to simulate a game board using java
Connect4Client - Class in core
Connect4Client allows user to connect to a server and play against anther player in real time
Connect4Client() - Constructor for class core.Connect4Client
 
Connect4ComputerPlayer - Class in core
 
Connect4ComputerPlayer(Connect4) - Constructor for class core.Connect4ComputerPlayer
 
Connect4ComputerPlayerTest - Class in test
Connect4ComputerPlayerTest uses Unit Testing to test both the desired functionality of Connect4ComputerPlayerss methods and to determine the class coverage of the code
Connect4ComputerPlayerTest() - Constructor for class test.Connect4ComputerPlayerTest
 
Connect4Constants - Interface in core
Connect4Constants will be implemented by Connect4Server and Connect4Client to maintain the state of the game
Connect4GUI - Class in ui
Connect4GUI, allows a user to experience a digital connect 4 game wither against another player or a computer
Connect4GUI() - Constructor for class ui.Connect4GUI
 
Connect4GUI.Disc - Class in ui
Disc is a hidden class is our disc object which will be used to represent our pieces on the board
Connect4Server - Class in core
Connect4Server is the server which interacts with clients and manages the Connect4 game between the 2
Connect4Server() - Constructor for class core.Connect4Server
 
Connect4Test - Class in test
Connect4Test uses Unit Testing to test both the desired functionality of Connect4s methods and to determine the class coverage of the code
Connect4Test() - Constructor for class test.Connect4Test
 
Connect4TextConsole - Class in ui
connect4UI is a the main interface of the connect 4 game and utilizes classes in order to simulate the full connect 4 experience and also has an AI option if you don't have a friend play with
Connect4TextConsole() - Constructor for class ui.Connect4TextConsole
 
CONTINUE - Static variable in interface core.Connect4Constants
CONTINUE is an int which tells the server the game is not over and that it should keep going until an end state has been entered
core - package core
 
createContent() - Method in class ui.Connect4GUI
createContent is the top method of this class calling every other method required and makes up the Connect4GUI game
